attributes.action: Ban the selling of plastic bottles in schools
attributes.additional_details: This would move to ban schools from selling plastic bottles in their canteens. They should supply water still for perhaps paper cups or students’ own reusable water bottles. This is in aim of reducing the UK’s plastic output.
attributes.background: Plastic bottles threaten our planet now more than ever. Having noticed the extensive use and NON-recycling of plastic bottles in my school, schools should not be able to SELL plastic bottles, and students should be encouraged to bring in their own reusable bottles instead.
